AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: As a Front-end Developer, my main responsibility is to improve user experiences. With experience in Angular, React, React-Native, NestJs, and Sass (which I have been improving since 2019), I am well prepared to face any development challenge.
In my career, I have professional experience in creating hybrid applications, such as 'Porteiros no Comando' and 'Imoveistock', which have gained prominence in the real estate market.
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Mid-Level Software Developer
Description: I used Angular to create the real estate sales and rental platform, as well as develop an internal backoffice system for employee use.
I integrated time in the development of the 'Imoveistock' and 'Porteiros no Comando' apps in react-native using MySQL on AWS and NestJS on Firebase.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Mid-Level Frontend Developer
Description: I worked as a Junior Front-End Developer, involved in projects in Angular, React-Native, and NestJS in the development of e-commerce sites and apps.

As a team, we adopted Bundle Analyzer and unit tests with Jest to prioritize efficient resource loading performance, as well as Redux for React navigation states and Styled Components for a more cohesive and modular approach.

I worked on schema changes through migrations in MongoDB, for transitions between database versions with versioning using NestJS, using modules and dependency injection structure to create scalable and modular architectures using Swagger for better manipulation of HTTPS methods.

The database version changes were managed through migrations in the context of NestJS, allowing incremental and controlled schema updates. This approach ensured efficient maintenance of the MongoDB database, adapting to the system's evolving needs.
I employed the use of Storybook to ensure visual consistency, also ensuring accessibility with tools like Axe, resulting in better and high-quality products.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Junior React Developer
Description: I participated in the development of e-commerce websites using React.
I implemented Server-Side Rendering to improve performance, leveraging React Hooks and Redux for better navigation management.
In styling, I adopted Styled Components and optimized performance with Code Splitting and lazy loading of images.
Using Webpack and Babel was crucial to ensure an optimized package in tests and debugging.
